descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Trebuchet MS][b][size=5][img]http://i.imgur.com/2KeEWDl.jpg?1[/img]
- Videos -

[/size][size=3]By Hodilton
[youtube]2CoPTfYl0I4[/youtube]

By Nozi87
[youtube]4M8Wg6RQ2pE[/youtube]

By Feuer tin[/size]
[youtube]s9-HOY2s628[/youtube]

[size=5]- Mod Description -[/size][/b]

[/font][b]An lore-friendly and script-free Overhaul of the town of Winterhold[/b].

[font=Trebuchet MS][b][size=5]- Performance -[/size][/b]

[size=3]My Rig: Asus P8B75-M/CSM Motherboard, Intel I7 2600 @ 3.4 GHz
[/size]8 Gb RAM, NVidia GTX 680 2 Gb, running alongside Somber 3 ENB + 1024 Textures and I get 40 FPS average.
[/font]
[font=Trebuchet MS][size=5][b]- Installation -[/b][/size]

[/font]Use [color=#ff7700]NMM[/color] to install, simply double-click the mod in the "Mods" tab of [color=#ff7700]NMM[/color] after it has finished downloading or [font=Trebuchet MS][size=2][color=#f4f4f4]Download manually[/color][color=#f4f4f4] and open the .rar file. Place the DATA folder into your SKYRIM folder, click "yes" to merge folders.[/color][/size][/font] Activate the mod through your preferred launcher by ticking the checkbox next to the esp.
[font=Trebuchet MS][color=#f4f4f4][size=2]
[/size][/color][/font][b][size=5]- Requirements -[/size][/b]

 Skyrim up to date

[font=Trebuchet MS][b][b][size=5]- Compatible Mods:
[/size][/b][/b][/font][b]
-[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53975/?]Vellamo - Mage home in Winterhold[/url] by Elianora[/b][font=Trebuchet MS][b]
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51188/?]No Snow Under the Roof[/url] by Prometheus ( some minor clipping )
-[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50491/?] Qaxes Winterhold Rebuild[/url] by QaxeQaixaci [/b][/font][b]( some  clipping, need feedback. )[/b][font=Trebuchet MS][b]

[size=5]- Not Compatible Mods:[/size]

[/b][/font] Mods that [b][color=#ff7700]overhauls[/color][/b] the[b] Town of [color=#ff7700]Winterhold[/color][/b] (with the exception of texture mods)

[b][size=5]- Future Plans -[/size][/b]

Small fixes if needed.

[font=Trebuchet MS][size=5][b]- Recommended mods -
[/b][/size]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40245/?]Immersive Roads[/url] by 32cm
[/font][color=#f4f4f4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13429/?]Designs of the Nords[/url] by [b]KEBW1144[/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55555/?]RS Children Overhaul[/url] by [b]Ranaline[/b]
[/color]
